mapper.select: SELECT B.CNT, A.COMMUNITY_SEQ, A.COMMON_SEQ, A.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, A.FILE_SEQ, A.COMMON_TITLE, A.COMMON_CONTENT, A.COMMON_HIT, A.COMMON_DEL_FLAG, A.IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') IN_DATE, A.UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UP_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') UP_DATE FROM COMMUNITY A, ( SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, COUNT(*) CNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY COMMUNITY_SEQ) B WHERE A.COMMUNITY_SEQ = B.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND A.COMMON_SEQ = '8'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY)+1, '8', null, null, #{title}, #{contents}, '0', 'N', #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
